overview.en: BCL TOKEN is a diversified trading platform ERA Exchange of MCP, which has a global circulation of 3 million tokens through multi-center technology operations and blockchain technology. The token has very good scarcity, reliability and safety thanks to the strength of MCP Wansheng International Group and the outstanding vision and market negotiation strength of its market analysis system, i.e.MCP Analysis System. In 2018, MCP Wansheng International Group successfully acquired ERA Exchange. ERA Exchange is a comprehensive and diversified international digital currency trading platform. It actively researches the development of trading tokens through multi-center technology operation. With the increase of users and their usage that drives the integration of big data, cryptocurrency trading token BCL TOKEN is finally created via development of blockchain technology.
overview.zh: 团队背景：BCL TOKEN 是 MCP万胜国际旗下多元化的交易平台 ERA Exchange的代币，透过采取多中心式技术运作和区块链技术打造出来的国际通用代币，在全世界的发行量为300万枚。因此，它具有非常好的稀缺性、可靠性和安全性。得益于MCP万胜国际集团的强大实力和旗下市场分析系统MCP Analysis System的卓绝眼光与市场谈判实力。2018年，MCP万胜国际集团成功收购ERA Exchange。ERA Exchange是一个综合性多元化国际数字货币交易平台，通过多中心式技术运作，积极研究交易代币的开发，配合用户的增加与使用，驱动大数据的整合；透过开发区块链技术，并打造属于自己的加密货币交易代币 BCL TOKEN。
